abstract: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas is intensifying his advertising push in Iowa, with the second television commercial of his campaign set to begin broadcasting on Monday.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas is intensifying his advertising push in Iowa, with the second television commercial of his campaign set to begin broadcasting on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas is intensifying his advertising push in Iowa, with the second television commercial of his campaign set to broadcast Monday in hopes of elevating him back into the top tier of Republican presidential candidates.

headline.main: With New Ad, Perry Looks to Better His Standing in Iowa
